sense.def:
To repress a feeling
pomeni potruditi se, da nas določen občutek ali čustvo ne prevzame ali da ga ne pokažemo.

seg.quote: It was all I could do to repress my laughter.

sense.def:
To repress a group of people
pomeni omejevati svobodo skupini ljudi in jo nadzorovati s silo.

seg.quote: The officers would help to repress their own people.
